changeSet.author: amirkovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence auth_seq; create type euserrole as enum ('ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_INVESTOR', 'ROLE_ENTREPRENEUR'); create table if not exists auth ( id bigint not null constraint auth_pkey primary key, accepted_terms_of_use boolean, active boolean, password varchar(255), registration_token varchar(255), registration_token_expiration_time timestamp, reset_token varchar(255), reset_token_expiration_time timestamp, user_role euserrole, temporary_login_token varchar(255), temporary_login_token_expiration_time timestamp, username varchar(255) constraint auth_uk_on_username unique, person_id bigint constraint auth_fk1_on_person references person );
